Angular Country State Select

By: Efren Bautista Jr.

www.efrenbautista.com

Simple demo and how to use this plugin!

This is a simple country state select dropdown. An angular directive that creates a country dropdown and state dropdown base on the country selected.

Example

How to install
Install usering bower:
bower install angular-country-state-select --save

Add to your app:
ngCountryStateSelect

How to use
Tag for Country
{{ countryview }}

Tag for State
{{ stateview }}
